backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor types for users, drivers, trips, payments, media, and authorization, setting up core domain models and state initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence reports mapping feature IDs to related files, components, and test IDs for workflow and trip progress features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short human-written summaries of all frontend files, covering dashboards, hooks, components, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and themes for light/dark mode using OKLCH values and shared styling primitives.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, branding assets, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app controller handling authentication, role selection, profile setup, and routing to dashboards based on user state and approvals.
frontend/src/components/ApprovalPendingS: Displays approvalâ€‘pending UI with instructions, driver requirements, and localized messaging based on user profile.
frontend/src/components/BookingRequestFo: Form for booking companion services, handling location, driver selection, pricing estimate, and checkout creation. Loads driver photos and validates required inputs before submitting.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying a link to scroll to a video and copyright text with branding.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with authentication, theme switching, language selection, and user role display. Shows user profile info and provides navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating or updating user or driver profiles, including location capture and photo uploads. Handles validation and submits profile data to backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionMod: Modal allowing users to choose between customer or driver roles, highlighting selected role and continuing on confirmation.
frontend/src/components/ServiceSelection: Form for selecting service types, drivers, locations, and payment method, with cost calculations and deposit checkout or trip creation. Loads drivers and supports optional translator needs.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupCheck: Admin-only dialog prompting initial Stripe configuration with secret key and allowed countries, submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/TripDetailsDialo: Dialog showing trip details and enabling drivers to update status, send messages, and record completion info.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Custom video player component with play/pause, mute, fullscreen, and optional autoplay-muted behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user, driver, trip, and profile data operations.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Provides language detection, storage, and translation utilities with fallback to English and key interpolation support.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: I18n provider supplying current language, setter, and translation function backed by stored preference.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and contains nested translation dictionaries for English, Spanish, and French.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exports a hook that returns the i18n context for accessing translations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom light/dark theme variables for a gold-accented UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard showing approval queues, company earnings, stats, and navigation to the company wallet.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboard.tsx: Client dashboard displaying welcome info, trip stats, active/completed trips, and service booking options.
frontend/src/pages/CompanyWallet.tsx: Displays company revenue metrics, commissions, deposits, and syncing status using Stripe-integrated earnings data.
frontend/src/pages/DriverDashboard.tsx: Driver dashboard showing profile, trips, earnings, and wallet access, with trip filtering and progress handling.
frontend/src/pages/DriverWallet.tsx: Displays detailed driver earnings, payment status breakdowns, and trip-based payout calculations.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, login buttons, feature sections, and an instructional video.
frontend/src/utils/tripProgress.ts: Utility for mapping trip status to progress steps, next driver actions, and display labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color system, extended shadows, keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON storing project metadata, feature definitions, and versioned descriptions for authentication, roles, profiles, driver workflows, admin tools, and Stripe-related features.
